meanings.definition: A tenancy held by a subtenant.
meanings.sent1: The subtenancies in the building were all sublet by the main tenant.
meanings.sent2: She was unaware of the subtenancies in the apartment complex.
meanings.sent3: The subtenancies in the old mansion were like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The subtenancies in the office building were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The subtenancies in the lease agreement were clearly outlined for everyone to understand.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a subtenant.
meanings.sent1: The subtenancies of the apartment complex were well-maintained by the subtenants.
meanings.sent2: He was not happy with the subtenancies of the rental property.
meanings.sent3: The subtenancies of the shared office space led to some interesting interactions.
meanings.sent4: The subtenancies of the market reflected the diverse community living there.
meanings.sent5: The subtenancies of the building were a source of constant gossip among the residents.
